title: Supreme Court and High Court (Extension of Jurisdiction to certain Tribal Areas) Act, 1973
title_en: Supreme Court and High Court (Extension of Jurisdiction to certain Tribal Areas) Act, 1973
description: Official consolidated text of Supreme Court and High Court (Extension of Jurisdiction to certain Tribal Areas) Act, 1973 (XXVII of 1973) published by The Pakistan Code (General Laws).

provisions.title: Section 1. Short title and commencement
provisions.content:
(1) This Act may be called the Supreme Court and
High Court (Extension of Jurisdiction to certain Tribal Areas) Act, 1973.
(2) It shall come into force at once.

provisions.title: Section 2. Extension of Jurisdiction of Supreme Court
provisions.content:
The Supreme Court of Pakistan shall
have, in relation to the Provincially Administered Tribal Areas of Chitral, Dir, Kalam, Swat and
Malakand Protected Area, the same Jurisdiction as it has in relation to the other areas of the North-
West Frontier Province.

provisions.title: Section 3. Extension of Jurisdiction of High Court
provisions.content:
The Peshawar High Court shall have, in
relation to the Tribal Areas specified in section 2, the same Jurisdiction as it has in relation to
the other areas of the North-West Frontier Province.

provisions.title: Section 4. 1 [Omitted]
provisions.content:
